title: Shawarma Legend Utils - v
description: This is a utility for the game Shawarma Legend.

errors.option_doesnt_exist: It seems like that this option doesn't exist (this shouldn't be happening). If you believe this is a bug, please report it on Github.
errors.cant_create_config: Failed to create config file, please check if you have permissions to write into the folder.
errors.config_incorrect: Config file incorrect! Please refer to the example config file on Github and fix your config file, or delete this config file and rerun the program to generate a new one.
errors.internal_error1: [Internal error: line number out of range, in func:insertLines]
errors.internal_error2: [Internal Error: key not found, in func:localization]

warnings.config_not_found: One or more config file not found. Creating new ones...

messages.first_time_guide: This guide will help you set hotkeys to control the game.
